# EZ899-241965 - Skylight Replacement
## Tender Announcement

### Brief Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of the Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the Skylight Replacement project (EZ899-241965). The successful contractor will be responsible for the installation of new skylights at various government buildings across British Columbia.

### Key Tender Information

*   **Tender Reference Number:** WS4679657698
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4679657698
*   **Publication Date:** July 10, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** July 25, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** No specific start date specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** December 13, 2024

### Project Details

The project involves the installation of new skylights at multiple locations across British Columbia, with a focus on the regions of Canada and British Columbia. The scope of work includes the removal of existing skylights and the installation of new ones. 

### Procurement Process

This is an invitation to qualify, and the selection criteria will be based on the lowest price submitted. The tendering process is competitive and open to all qualified contractors who can meet the requirements specified in the tender package.

### Contract Opportunities

The following trade agreements apply to this project: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA). The end-user entities involved in this project are the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this project are based on the lowest price, and all bids will be evaluated based on this criterion.

### Contact Information

For more information about this tender, please contact Simon Leung, Leung, Simon (SPAC/PSPC), at [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Attachments

No attachments are provided with this announcement. Please refer to the tender package for more information.
